sentence: The beach convenient and pools well maintained and staffed with careful professionals
The pools spa workout facility restaurants and proximity to the beach make it a very relaxing and enjoyable vacation property
There is a special pool for kids with slides a special hotub grotto for adults and a general pool for everyone
Lovely hotel loads of pools bars and restaurants
From the kid pool activities and easter brunch each hotel faculty member had great customer service and was there to help
Arthur at the Hyat pool next to Shubes cafe is an amazing person that went above and beyond

There were so many added and extra features that we never expected and complementary like unlimited bottle water free smores to make at the fire pit heated pools and water slides which came in handy since it was late January when we visited free shuttle to the shopping area and pier etc
My 7 year old son loved the pool
There was an adult hot tub grotto area that was really nice
The pools and spas were all clean every day
The main pool has daytime construction however the kids pool is away from the noise and even nice as well as two good sized jacuzis near the Pacific Waters Spa to enjoy the tranquility
The weather was perfect so we did have a chance to swim and us the hot tub
The pools were both great kids went down the slide many times
We have stayed at this resort many times including through pool remodel construction
Prices at the restaurants pool grill and prices to park our vehicle were OUTRAGEOUS
Pool has very limited menu and there are no expreso drinks available a bit disappointing
Would have liked the pool spa to stay open a little later maybe an adults only time
Adult pool kids pool jacuzis spa services high end restaurant as well as pizzeria for casual dining bike and surfboard rentals
why was this on the bill in the first place given unavailable pool and spa status to be fair there is a kidie style second rate pool in the back that was open2
Larger pool area undergoing construction right now
It was often like swimming on top of an oil slick with the sun cream in the water
My two year old is about 36 inches tall and I was happy that the pool rules allowed her to ride the little slide with a parent or water wings
There are slides for kids pools are warmed properly even in the winter
Special pool for those that appreciate quitnes as in no kids running around
